General.Name: Max Ventures and Industries Limited
General.Description: Max Ventures and Industries Limited operates in the real estate business. The company engages in the construction and development of residential and commercial properties. It also offers facility management, community development, and managed offices services in commercial real estate. The company was formerly known as Capricorn Ventures Limited and changed its name to Max Ventures and Industries Limited in January 2016. Max Ventures and Industries Limited was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Noida, India.
